Registering Passport Following are the documents that are required for Applying Passport 1)Minor 1) It is assumed that consent of both parents is available, unless specified.
 2) For minor applicants, present address proof document in the name of parent(s) can be submitted.
 3) It is advised to carry original and self-attested copies of parents passport to Passport Seva Kendra (PSK), in case parents possess passport.
 4) For minor applicants, documents can be attested by parents.
 5) The minor applicant is eligible for Non-ECR till he/she attains the age of 18 years.
 ECR/ECNR ECR stands for Emigration Check Required and ECNR stands for Emigration Check Not Required.
